markdown: ###### Moderate Positive reputation with the [Príncipi](/principi/) | rewardname2 = | reward2 = | rewardname3 = | reward3 = | rewardname4 = | reward4 = | rewardname5 = | reward5 = | rewardname6 = | reward6 = | prev = Bounty - Kuaro | conc = | internalname = BOUNTY_TSK_Principi_03 | guid = afe91b67-54f0-4c77-b607-1ab9504ff9de }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [bounty](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsBounties/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis Udita has hired the Watcher to track down [Rock-Stomper Rodul](/rockStomperRodul/), a Vailian captain in command of the galleon [The Goat's Horn](/theGoatsHorn/). There's a bounty to claim in exchange for evidence of the captain's death. ## Walkthrough * Rock-Stomper Rodul is often found sailing Goat's Horn in the open waters east of [Neketaka](/neketaka/). It's a difficult encounter, as the galleon is very well armed and has plenty of hull to spare. Don't approach without plenty of guns. ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/Bounties/BOUNTY_TSK_Principi_03.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Bounty - Rock-Stomper Rodul''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Udita has hired me to track down Rock-Stomper Rodul, a Vailian captain in command of the galleon Goat's Horn. There's a bounty to claim in exchange for evidence of the captain's death. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Kill Rock-Stomper Rodul and take his ship's triumph.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Rock-Stomper Rodul is often found sailing Goat's Horn in the open waters east of Neketaka. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to Udita.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | Rock-Stomper Rodul's bounty is mine to claim. I can accept the reward with Udita at Lifter's Refuge in Dunnage. |- ! colspan="3" | Unused strings |- | rowspan="1" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''-''' | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 30001 | |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I dealt with Rock-Stomper Rodul and claimed the reward for his bounty. |}
